subject: Leaking faucet in kitchen
body: Hello, my kitchen faucet has started leaking and is dripping constantly. Can someone come fix it soon?

subject: Question about rent payment
body: Hi, I wanted to check if my rent payment for this month has been received and what my current balance is.

subject: Locked out of my apartment
body: I am locked out of unit 3B at Greenwich Ave. Please help!

subject: Lease renewal inquiry
body: Can you tell me about the lease renewal process and if there will be any rent changes?

subject: Question about parking
body: Is there additional guest parking at 2000 Holland Av?

subject: Congratulations! You've won a free cruise!
body: Click here for your prize: http://spam.example.com
